content:
"The Million Dollar Shot" by Dan Gutman is a thrilling sports story about a young basketball fan named Eddie who has a chance to win a million dollars in a halftime contest during an NBA game.

Eddie is a passionate basketball player and fan, and he dreams of playing in the NBA someday. When his school enters a contest to win a halftime show during an NBA game, Eddie is chosen to represent his school and take a shot from half-court to win a million dollars.

Eddie is excited and nervous about the opportunity, but he is determined to make the shot. With the help of his best friend, Annie, he practices every day, perfecting his technique and increasing his chances of success.

As the big game approaches, Eddie and Annie face challenges and setbacks, but they never give up hope. When Eddie finally takes the shot during halftime, the crowd goes wild as the ball sails through the air and lands in the basket.

"The Million Dollar Shot" is an exciting and inspiring story that teaches young readers about perseverance, determination, and the power of believing in oneself. It shows that with hard work and dedication, anything is possible, and dreams can come true.
